titleStmt.title: Stela of Prasat Sdok Kak Thom (K. 235), 974 Śaka

handDesc.p: The lettering is characteristic of the eleventh century CE.

projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_v01.xml file.

lg.l: āliṅgate sma paritaḥ kila yasya lakṣmīḥ .
tathā prajā yas svam avekṣya dharmmam· .
tanmātr̥vaṅśe yatayas striyo vātanmātr̥vaṅśe yatayas striyo vā
jātā vidhāv atra niyuktabhāvaḥjātā vidhāv atra niyuktabhāvaḥ

>
tadyājakās syur na kathañcid anyatadyājakās syur na kathañcid anya

div.p: Several same events were mentioned in both Sanskrit and Khmer portions of the inscription. For table of correspondance, see George Cœdès and Pierre Dupont (62-63) and Kunthea Chhom (331-332).

First edited by George Cœdès and Pierre Dupont (76-134) with a French translation; reedited here by Dominic Goodall and Kunthea Chhom from the estampage EFEO n. 1191 and EFEO n. 1361. Chhany Sak-Humphry (35-54) provides an English translation. Kamaleswar Bhattacharya (139-187) provides an English translation of the Sanskrit portion of the inscription.
